parsed = parse_date(date_str)

    print(f'Days until event: {days}')

def days_until(s):
    try:
        target = parse_date(s)
    except ValueError:
        print('Invalid format. Use YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY.')
        return
    delta = target.date() - datetime.now().date()
    days = delta.days
    if days == 0:
        print('Happy event! ðŸŽ‰')
    elif days < 0:
        print('Date has already passed!')
    else:
        print(f'Days until event: {days}')
